title: Is there a tool to reconstruct .reloc section?
content: Seems like unpacking UPX manually is not a trivial task any more, due to ASLR and the need to recover the relocation table. So, before reinventing the wheel, I'd like to know if there's already some tool to do this.

answers_data.content:
There is a tool called ReloX by MackT/uCF2000:

At the time of writing, a copy seems to be available here.

comments.text: Does it work with x64 binaries?
did not check, but likely not
